name: イマドキ女子のハイカラな二択
name_original: イマドキ女子のハイカラな二択
description:
I want to sparkle with the two choices!
Your choice will determine a girl's day!

〇 Day of a Girl
Two choices at a part-time job
Two choices at a field day
Two choices at high school debut
Two choices at a date
etc.

How to play
Read the questions above carefully!
Choose one of the two options below to see what the girl will do!
If you answer correctly, go to the next action!
If you answer incorrectly, you will see the result!
